alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 10:01AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Along the Illinois river from Utica to Ottawa in La Salle county in north central Illinois. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying overbank areas near Starved Rock State Park, Naplate, and Ottawa is likely. Flooding of park areas and low-lying roadways is possible in Ottawa, and flooding of trails is possible at Starved Rock State Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 959 AM CST, river gauge and satellite imagery indicate an ice jam upstream of the Starved Rock Lock and Dam. - Rapid fluctuations in river levels can be expected as ice jams develop, break, or move along the river. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Warning means flooding is imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along rivers, creeks, and other waterways should take immediate precautions to protect life and property.
